messages.subject: New here so forgive if repeats
messages.msgSnippet: Hello, Let me introduce myself, my name is David and i live in the U.S. and im very facinated by the samurai culture, along with many other aspects of asian
messages.messageBody:
Hello,

Let me introduce myself, my name is David and i live in the U.S. and
im very facinated by the samurai culture, along with many other
aspects of asian cutlure in general. I can't say im overly
knowledgable in the history of the samurai but i did learn a little
bit in a history class i took last year, assuming the information was
correct. Does anyone have any good reccomendations for reading
material, not only about the cutlure and history, but about the
aspects and philosphy's of weilding the sword? Any information would
be great.

Thanks for yoru time.

D.K.
